contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.qandaqu.QAndAQuestionPageContent:
Is it possible to display content items on an admin listing page, rather than object types that are created via module classes? 
***
**Environment**
* Xperience by Kentico version: \[30.5.3]
* .NET version: \[8]
* Execution environment: Azure
* Link to relevant [Xperience by Kentico documentation](https://docs.kentico.com/documentation/developers-and-admins/customization/extend-the-administration-interface/ui-pages/reference-ui-page-templates/listing-ui-page-template#:~:text=Override%20the%20ObjectType%20property%20to%20specify%20which%20objects%20are%20listed.)
